title: looking to become the best female gamer on oceania TIPS
body:
I've generally played the game with a "get fed or die tryin" attitude. But i've recently decided to try and play things smartly and play the game, not the lane. tips are welcome, im currently silver 4 and climbing :) thx

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
> looking to become the best gamer on oceania TIPS

Fixed.

This isn't the fucking Olympics. It's not Women vs. Women and Men vs. Men. Gender shouldn't affect your ability to play a video game. Stop putting yourselves in a different class because you can't be bothered competing against the pre-established community.

it's widely known men are superior to women, why wouldn't i categorize into genders for a video game? Do you see any females in the pro scene? No, gosh wonder why... Don't bring the %%%%%% into this either ty.
Actually [Remilia](http://lol.gamepedia.com/Remi) played in NA LCS this split. Very good {{champion:412}} **Thresh**, it's a shame the team synergy didn't work out.

Remilia is a transgender, and there is (as you're no doubt seen) a ton of debates and issues about woman/born woman etc.

Very good Thresh, lackluster other champions.
@ what grazer said, when i said don't bring the %%%%%% into this, remelia is who i was talking about. He has a male brain/reactions etc. Not a female.
That's a big goal your trying to achieve. I would suggest finding the nearest bed and going to sleep, so you can keep dreaming.
:\ if u have as much faith as me we can believe and it will happen D:
this is exactly why i give u tip no.1 on my reply lol

Well, I can't see why you couldn't be the best girl in the OCE servers. Just make your champion pool bigger and learn the basics of all roles and best of luck on Summoners Rift.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
im riven only soz

TIP NO. 1: do not states in any form what so ever that you are female
no. 2: don't die, lol joking

what position do u play mostly?
ADC? support? top mid jg?
i main riven top/mid atm.

Can't help u then
I main support TwT

Danklight vayne, sounds familiar to arclight vayne, don't happen to be a smurf/or of relation to that player by any chance lol

otherwise i say good luck, hope you can, maybe join the opl/nacs etc
both are me :) arclight cant connect to forums idk why :P

try to carry. if you can't carry, get  carried. if you lose lane, lose lane gracefully and play catchup. nobody likes someone who's 0/5 in lane and still trying to flash onto the opponent to get kills. that's what I call "the riven effect" - where dying just makes you MORE aggressive and you feed your arse off
did u know i was a riven main? or unrelated coincidink?
Coincidence. Most Riven mains are beyond help so I'd suggest giving up now.
please dont lose faith in me ):
rude. :\
